titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the serpent stones imported from India shewing their admirable virtues in curing malignant spotted feavers / written by a countrey physitian to Dr. Burwell, president of the Colledge of Physitians in London.
titleStmt.author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Burwell, Thomas, 1626-1702.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed also to John Pechey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
